display.title: New Tools for New Ores
description: Most of the items we've needed from the &&3Otherworld&&r so far just needed some Spiritfire. However, we will need to use the help of the &&3Third Eye&&r to find the Ore of the &&3Otherworld&&r.
We'll also need a special pickaxe to be able to mine it. For this, we'll need to Infuse a Demon into a &&dSpirit Attuned Pickaxe Head&&r to create a pickaxe that can break this new kind of ore.
